title: I flew with birds. You can too.
description:
In southern France, there's a man called Christian who flies a microlight aircraft, alongside flocks of birds. And he takes passengers. ■ More about Fly With Birds: https://www.flywithbirds.com/

Camera: Simon Gillouin
Editor: Michelle Martin https://twitter.com/mrsmmartin
Producer: Axel Zeiliger https://block8production.com

I'm at https://tomscott.com
on Twitter at https://twitter.com/tomscott

and on Instagram as tomscottgo
